description:
Windows port of Easydict - Dictionary and translation app

Windows port of Easydict translation app. Supports 15+ translation services (Google, DeepL, OpenAI, Gemini, etc.), global hotkeys, multiple window modes, clipboard monitoring, and LLM streaming. Self-contained application with system tray support.
What's Changed (v0.4.0 → v0.5.0)
Features
- feat: add BrowserHostRegistrar for GitHub release-based browser support install (#95)
- feat: add support for publishing NativeBridge into MSIX output for browser extension
- feat: add setup page and localization for Easydict extension
- feat: update Chrome extension ID and enable browser support menu
- feat: add NativeBridge publishing and update browser extension integration
- feat: add OCR screenshot hotkey settings to Settings page
- feat: change OCR region selection to double-click and add screen capt… (#85)
Bug Fixes
- fix: use GetKeyStateForCurrentThread for Shift+Enter newline detection (#93)
Chores
- chore: update version to 0.5.0 in project files
Other
- Add proxy model allowlist validation for built-in AI service (#94)
- Refactor Built-in AI: dual-mode routing proxy, rate limiting (#84)
- docs: add winget install command and mark winget as completed
- i18n: localize ToggleSwitch On/Off content in settings page
- @claude feat: add OCR Translate to system tray right-click context menu (#81)
- Add 'Start minimized to tray' setting
- Add help tooltips to UI elements across all languages (#80)
